TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示一个 字段，该字段可使用户按页码选择页。

span.span: Represents a field that enables users to select a page by page number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将显示在导航控件控件。The class displays navigation controls in a control. 可以使用的控件到实现的控件显示的数据进行分页接口，如控件。The controls can be used to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 对象可显示为按钮，用户可以单击要移动到特定于页的页码。The object displays page numbers as buttons that users can click to move to specific a page. 该控件还显示使用户能够访问的数据不是由所显示的控件的更多页的下一页和上一页按钮。The control also displays next-page and previous-page buttons that enable users to access more pages of data than the ones that are displayed by the control. 你可以自定义外观使用下表中列出的属性的对象。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the properties that are listed in the following table. |属性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||用于当前页码的 CSS 类。The CSS class for the current page number.| ||用于下一页和前一页按钮的 CSS 类。The CSS class for the next-page and previous-page buttons.| ||用于表示页码的按钮的 CSS 类。The CSS class for the buttons that represent the page numbers.| 可以使用属性来选择将显示的按钮的类型。You can use the property to select the type of button that will be displayed. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型Button type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 内的控件用它们之间的不间断空格呈现对象。The controls inside the object are rendered with non-breaking spaces between them. 如果你想要自定义此行为，则可以使用属性。If you want to customize this behavior, you can use the property. 您可以隐藏中的对象通过设置控件属性设置为`false`。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 你无法控制的下一页和前一页按钮的可见性。You cannot control the visibility of the next-page and previous-page buttons. 如果关联的数据控件具有可用于显示其他页由控件显示。They are displayed by the control if the associated data control has additional pages available to display. 可以使用属性指定多少按钮显示在对象。You can use the property to specify how many buttons are displayed in a object. 每个按钮对应于一个页码。Each button corresponds to a page number. 通过设置可设置页下一步按钮的文本属性。You can set the text of the next-page button by setting the property. 可以通过设置前一页按钮的文本属性。You can set the text of the previous-page button by using the property. 当属性设置为，必须为下一页和前一页按钮提供将显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image that will be displayed for the next-page and previous page buttons. 执行此操作通过设置和属性。You do this by setting the and properties. 在这种情况下，相应的文本属性作为备用文本使用的图像。In that case, the corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 例如，通过指定的文本属性将显示为下一步页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象中显示的数据进行分页控件。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/CS/NumericPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/VB/NumericPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通常用于将字段添加到动态创建控件。This constructor is typically used when you add fields to a dynamically created control. 若要添加动态地为对象控件，创建一个新对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到的字段集合控件。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加对象传递给控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/CS/NumericPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/VB/NumericPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 对象中显示的按钮的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 要在 对象中显示的按钮的数目。

span.span: The number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 默认值为 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的按钮中显示的数目对象。Use the property to specify the number of buttons to display in a object. 每个按钮对应于一个页码。Each button corresponds to a page number. 如果对象具有为指定的数目更多的页，控件显示允许用户访问下一组页的下一页按钮。If the object has more pages than the number specified for , the control displays a next-page button that lets users access the next set of pages. 对象显示现有的页码按钮。The object displays buttons only for existing page numbers. 如果对象具有较少的页面以显示有关指定的数目，该控件显示的按钮将此属性指定的数目。If the object has fewer pages to show than the number specified for , the control shows fewer buttons than the number specified by this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来更改中显示的页按钮的默认数量对象的控件。The following example shows how to use the property to change the default number of page buttons that are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型值Button type value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 当属性设置为，必须为下一页和前一页按钮提供的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image for the next-page and previous page buttons. 若要执行此操作，可以使用和属性。To do this, you can use the and properties. 相应的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。The corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 例如，通过指定的文本属性将显示为下一步页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. 如果属性不是空字符串或`null`，则对象将忽略的值属性。If the property is not an empty string or `null`, the object ignores the value of the property. 在这种情况下，控件用于创建按钮。In that case, the control is used to create the buttons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定在显示的图像按钮对象的控件。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置当前页码样式的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the current page number.

value.span: 用于设置浏览器中当前页码的样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the current page number in the browser.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定使用的样式的 CSS 类对象，表示当前选定的页的页码。Use the property to specify the CSS class that is used to style the object that represents the number of the page that is currently selected. 属性始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持设置 CSS 的浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定要在当前页码样式的 CSS 类对象的控件。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the current page number in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 处理 对象中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法以处理中发生的事件对象的一个按钮在控件内单击时。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法将检查的属性中包含的对象`e`参数，然后执行相应的措施。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出了由提供的按钮对象，并单击按钮时执行的操作。The following table lists the buttons provided by the object and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|操作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |数字Number|页码Page number|导航到相应的数据页。Navigates to the corresponding page of data.| |前一页Previous page||显示上一组页码，并导航到最后一个该集中的数据页。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the last page of data in that set.| |下一页Next page||显示上一组页码，并导航到该集中的数据的第一页。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the first page of data in that set.|

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 为 对象中的下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，使用属性指定为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 图像可以是任何文件格式支持的浏览器，如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 和.png。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browser, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 当属性设置为值，并设置属性不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为中的下一页按钮显示图像对象的控件。The following example shows how to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

value.span: 为下一页按钮显示的文本。

value.span: 默认值为"..."。

span.span: The default is "...".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，在指定的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。When the property is set to , the text specified in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义中的页导航字段的下一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the next-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

member this.NextPreviousButtonCssClass : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个级联样式表 (CSS) 类，用于为页导航字段的下一页按钮和上一页按钮设置样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 用于为页导航字段的下一页按钮和上一页按钮设置样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一页和上一页按钮显示由类，以让用户访问数据的其他页的页总数大于中指定的值时属性。The next-page and previous-page buttons are displayed by the class to let users access other pages of data when the total number of pages is greater than the value specified in the property. 属性始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持设置 CSS 的浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定要在下一页和上一页按钮设置样式的 CSS 类对象的控件。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the next-page and previous-page buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个级联样式表 (CSS) 类，用于为页导航字段的页码按钮设置样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 用于为页导航字段的页码按钮设置样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示页码按钮类，以使用户能够直接对各个页导航。Page-number buttons are displayed by the class to enable users to navigate directly to individual pages. 指定的 CSS 类属性应用于所有情况下显示的页面编号对象，但当前选定的页除外。The CSS class specified by the property is applied to all page numbers that are displayed by the object, except for the page that is currently selected. 当前所选的页使用由指定的 CSS 类属性。The page currently selected page uses the CSS class that is specified by the property. 属性始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持设置 CSS 的浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定要在中的页码按钮设置样式的 CSS 类对象的控件。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the page number buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 为 对象中的上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，使用属性指定为前一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button. 图像可以是浏览器，例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 和.png 支持任何文件格式。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browsers, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 当属性设置为值，并设置属性不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为中的前一页按钮显示图像对象的控件。The following example shows how to display an image for the previous-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 为上一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 默认值为"..."。

span.span: The default is "...".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为中的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。When the property is set to , the text in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在浏览器支持的工具提示，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义中的页导航字段前一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将在控件之间呈现非换行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控件之间呈现非换行空格，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否不间断空格 (HTML` `字符引用) 将呈现的控件之间对象，例如页面按钮。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character reference) will be rendered between the controls of the object, such as the page buttons. 如果需要更好地控制要创建使用级联样式表 (CSS) 类的布局，则可以设置到`false`。If you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes, you can set to `false`.
